bibl.title: Notes on P. Oxy. XXXIX.
bibl.note: Textual notes on P. Oxy. XXXIX, 2878; 2879, col. i. 1-5; 2881 (b) 7, from a play; 2883, apparently from the Messeniaka of Rhianus; 2891, the beginning of Philaenis, "Peri aphrodision".
bibl.seg: 364 Carmina varia Graeca Philaenis Rhianus Cretensis
Page Denys L., Notes on P. Oxy. XXXIX.
Textual notes on P. Oxy. XXXIX, 2878; 2879, col. i. 1-5; 2881 (b) 7, from a play; 2883, apparently from the Messeniaka of Rhianus; 2891, the beginning of Philaenis, "Peri aphrodision".
